data.text: Years of reckless spending have led to inflation and increased the cost of living. I am working to combat this inflation, cut red tape, and lower costs for Idahoans. https://t.co/UaJgs0kRag
Idaho was the first to protect our female athletes, and I am proud to continue to lead the fight for the sanctity of women and girls’ sports at every level. https://t.co/3QzUZrFvfi
Congratulations to the Idahoans who are representing the Gem State from the ice rink to the slopes on @TeamUSA this Winter Olympics. You make Idaho proud! https://t.co/Le4a5PY4jf

Idaho is home to a vast supply of critical minerals that are vital to our national security. This new antimony processing facility in the Silver Valley is yet another example of how the Gem State is strengthening U.S. defense capabilities. https://t.co/RPouAQ3vUy

Reliable, always on energy, like nuclear is essential to meet our growing energy demands. My ARC Act will incentivize investment in new reactors and ensure the U.S. continues to lead in nuclear energy. https://t.co/0HV5v3L19N
